data.title: Safe California Endorsers
data.meta_description: Learn about the Climate-Safe California campaign here and please join us by endorsing it here for accelerated climate action that will also catalyze efforts globally. See why some of these visionaries are endorsing the campaign here. Together we will secure a vibrant, healthy, and climate-safe future for all. Affiliations are for identification purposes only. Total endorsements: 2469 Last update: 7/24/2024 ... Read more
data.text:
Learn about the Climate-Safe California campaign here and please join us by endorsing it here for accelerated climate action that will also catalyze efforts globally. See why some of these visionaries are endorsing the campaign here.

Together we will secure a vibrant, healthy, and climate-safe future for all.

Affiliations are for identification purposes only.

Total endorsements: 2469

Last update: 7/24/2024
